thread.title: ‘I get to go see my grandbabies!’: Madonna-dressed Paula Deen vogues off ‘Dancing with the Stars’
thread.title_full: ‘I get to go see my grandbabies!’: Madonna-dressed Paula Deen vogues off ‘Dancing with the Stars’ | savannahnow.com

author: Josh Rayburn
title: ‘I get to go see my grandbabies!’: Madonna-dressed Paula Deen vogues off ‘Dancing with the Stars’
text:
Photos From "Dancing with the Stars" Related Stories 'Dancing' Paula Deen: Savannah has 'given me everything' It's official. Paula Deen will compete on this season of 'Dancing with the Stars' By Josh Rayburn After six weeks of dancing, fun and tears, Savannah celebrity chef Paula Deen learned she had been voted off the current season of “Dancing with the Stars” on Monday night.
But before her big goodbye, Deen and dance partner Louis Van Amstel took a turn on the dance floor to Madonna’s “Vogue.” The performance was an homage to Madonna’s performance of the song at the 1990 MTV Video Music Awards.
Critics of the show agreed with its judges, with one reviewer from TVLine.com saying: “the routine consisted of little more than Paula getting pulled across the dance floor by the men. Oh, and hand motions. Lots and lots of hand motions.”
But as for Deen, she had a lot of fun and can’t wait to get home to Savannah.
“I get to go see my grandbabies!” she exclaimed to host Tom Bergeron after her elimination was announced.
And she certainly has no regrets.
“I’ve been like a fish out of water for six weeks. It was worth it!”
And here's a link to Madonna's original performance
